title: (x) It's like being caught in a hail storm of mint imperials - Berthold Block {Dav, Alexey}
content:
Hi,

Does anyone have any idea what this typeface might be? Or could you possibly suggest anything similar?

Thanks,  
Clare

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629082540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/original_source.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Eileen Ng" simple geometric sans - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629082540/http:/typophile.com/node/19142 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) VISA corporate typeface - Whitney {Miguel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629082540/http:/typophile.com/node/19127 "Go to next forum topic")
author: clare.holmes

comments.content:
Clare, Yours should be ’Block _( Condensed )_’.

Dav
